title: Presidents Day, Conversation Issues, Comedy Roulette, Love Sacrifice and more.
itunes:title: Presidents Day, Conversation Issues, Comedy Roulette, Love Sacrifice and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show goes out to pets, animal trainers and members of PETA. Steve is doing the show today in alligator shoes. Have you ever found yourself having a conversation with someone and you are just clueless as to what they are talking about? Comedy Roulette brings us the things you say to people that show up unexpected and you don't want them there. The Chief Love Officer gives words of encouragement to a young lady that is struggling in the dating scene. If you are unsure of your employment, here are the ways that let you know that you have been fired. Certain trends have hit and kept going. The only thing is, Junior wants to know when did that start. Have you given up anything for love? Steve will tell you what he has lost. When something is too good to be true, it usually is. Does this also apply to your relationship? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells us to hang in there.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
